thanks.
six tracks recorded at London's Astoria in July. includes the songs 'Obstacle 1' and 'Stella Was a Diver And She Was Always Down' from 'Turn On The Bright Lights' as well as 'Pioneer to The Falls', 'Mammoth', 'Rest My Chemistry' and 'The Heinrich Maneuver', all from this year's 'Our Love To Admire'.
